title: Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1810
provenance: Howard Phillips, L Henrietta Place, London, W1. purchased (7-27-71) by WPW.
dimensions: H x diam.: 21.9 x 28 cm (8 5/8 x 11 in.)
description: "Ship's decanter" type. Broad, flat base with cut comb flutes. Long tapered flutes interrupted by 3 flat neck rings. Flat projecting lip. Cut target stopper, with fluted neck.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-225-a,b.
